text:
Created attachment 33886
patch for 2.4.x and trunk

Building abs.exe with VC14 fails with an error message OPENSSL_Uplink(000007FEDF828000,08): no OPENSSL_Applink

More details: https://www.apachelounge.com/viewtopic.php?p=33450
creator: phpdev@ehrhardt.nl

text:
Jan_E, your proposed patch with abs is: 

+#if defined(_MSC_VER) && _MSC_VER >= 1900 
+#include <openssl/applink.c> 
+#endif 
+ 

So applink is included also for ab.exe and when you do not use OpenSSL (like LibreSSL) 

So better to add condition: 

#if defined(HAVE_OPENSSL) 
#include <openssl/applink.c
creator: info@apachelounge.com
phpdev@ehrhardt.nl

text:
Committed to trunk: r1745767
Proposed for 2.4: r1745768
creator: gls@gknw.net
wrowe@apache.org
text: Becomes available in 2.4.21 and later, also backported for 2.2.32, marking resolved.
